result.execSummary:
The defendant Basil John Raffa was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Basil John Raffa is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Basil John Raffa was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: Any other probation periods.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Courts Office- $25.00 per month payment plan to begin on 8/1/2015 and on the 1st of each month thereafter.
AODA assessment and comply with recommendations.

timeConds.notes: banked to be used by agent if necessary.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
